text:
Dear Student,
I hope this message finds you well! The Middlesex College New Brunswick and Perth Amboy Centers are excited to announce the upcoming Credit ESL classes for the Spring 2025 semester.
Attached, youâ€™ll find flyers detailing the Spring 2025 Credit ESL course offerings at both the New Brunswick and Perth Amboy Centers. With various course options available, you can find a class that fits your needs and schedule.
Important: Registration for Spring 2025 opens on October 14th for current students. Be sure to register early to secure your spot and build your ideal schedule, as spaces fill quickly.
If you have any questions, need assistance with registration, or want to schedule an appointment with an academic advisor, please feel free to reach out using the contact information below. Weâ€™re here to support you throughout the process!
